item.title: Triggering Github Pages Build using Github Actions
item.description: Recently, I’ve been playing with Github Actions and the first thing that I’ve thought of doing is how I can use Github Actions aka Steve (let’s name it Steve because Github Actions is just too unfriendly! ) to deploy my statically-generated site to Github Pages. The current deployment workflow involves TravisCI handling the generation of static files and deploying them to the gh-pages branch using a built-in configuration.
